---
title: "Protocol Probe"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


Fast rate: 10000 Hz <---> Protocol$fADCSequenceInterval: 100 (us)

First holding : 1/64 floor total sample points per episode
Last holding : 1/64 floor total sample points per episode
(Not sure if 1/64 is related to Protocol$nLevelHysteresis, which is always set to 64)
Epoch arragement:
[First holding][Actual epochs][Last holding][Remaining samples (irrelevant)]

---------------------WAVEFORM---------------------
Type:
Step 1
Ramp 2
Pulse 3
Trngl 4
Cos 5
Biphsc 7

fEpochInitLevel <---> Vhi 1st episode
fEpochLevelInc <---> delta voltage of Vhi per episode
lEpochInitDuration <---> total length of epoch (pts) 1st episode
lEpochDurationInc <---> delta pts of lEpochInitDuration per episode
previous epoch end level <---> Vprev

Step:
step cycle: Vhi

Ramp:
ramp cycle: Vprev-(linear)-Vhi

Pulse:
lEpochPulsePeriod <---> length per pulse cycle (pts)
lEpochPulseWidth <---> length per pulse Vhi (pts)
pulse cycle: Vhi-Vprev

Biphsc:
Vlo = 2Vprev - hi (min/max at instrument range)
lEpochPulsePeriod <---> length per biphsc cycle (pts)
lEpochPulseWidth <---> length per biphsc Vhi-Vlo (pts)
biphsc cycle: Vhi-Vlo-Vprev
              

Trng:
fEpochInitLevel <---> Vhi
previous epoch end level <---> Vprev
lEpochPulsePeriod <---> length per trng cycle (pts)
lEpochPulseWidth <---> length Vprev-(linear)-Vhi cycle (pts)
trng cycle: Vprev----(linear)----Vhi----(linear)----Vprev
            |---lEpochPulseWidth---|---Remaining Pts----|
            |--------------lEpochPulseWidth-------------|

Cos:
cos cycle: Vprev--(cos)--Vhi--(cos)--Vprev


---------------------MISC---------------------
